title: >>> V for FIVE
body_text:
What a finale DODGEBALL XL proved to be, closing out Season 4 of dodgeball. An incredible event all around which set records and provided memories for all that attended. But the next season is upon us and arguably, it'll be the biggest one of them all, headlined by the [already] highly anticipated event of the summer, DODGEBALL 50.
________________________________________
_____
Coming off the heels of the phenomenal DODGEBALL XL, DODGEBALL 41 will begin what is already looking to be the most crucial and important season of all time.
Already, Season V is looking pretty impressive:
DODGEBALL 41: Saturday, May 27th (6:30pm, WHS)
DODGEBALL 42: Sunday, June 4th (3pm, ORP)
DODGEBALL 43: Sunday, June 11th (3pm, ORP)
DODGEBALL 44: Saturday, June 17th (6:30pm, WHS)
DODGEBALL 45: Saturday, June 24th (6:30pm, WHS)
The road begins again. For now, enjoy the time given with nine events leading up to the big "Five O". As past events have shown, anything can happen.
........
Below are some facts about the season openers:
> DODGEBALL XONE still holds one of the highest attendances ever with an impressive 33. Very few events have been able to beat that number.
> DODGEBALL 21 is one of two non-"ten" events to include video. For those unaware, much of the footage from "Not JUST a Game" is taken from this event.
> DODGEBALL XXX-ONE saw the debut of Prison Ball, due mainly to the record low attedance of 12.
> DODGEBALL 41 ... May 27th, 2006 ... Wall High School ... 6:30pm Start time.
________________________________________
_____
Poster Contest for DODGEBALL 43!
The poster contest originally scheduled for DODGEBALL 42 will be pushed back for DODGEBALL 43 on June 11th. The reason for the change is to simply give contestants more time to submit a poster. Remember, you can submit as many posters as you'd like. Posters should be sent in before June 5th.
